text: Japanese War Bride is a 1952 American drama movie. It is also known as East is East. It was directed by King Vidor. The movie stars Shirley Yamaguchi, Don Taylor, Cameron Mitchell, and Marie Windsor. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * *Japanese War Bride at Turner Classic Movies Category:1952 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by King Vidor
title: Japanese War Bride
